techmeme.title: After nine months with Starlink, the Marubo, an Indigenous Amazon tribe, faces challenges like addiction and concerns about potential loss of cultural identity (Jack Nicas/New York Times)
MSI announces Claw 8 AI+, its next-gen handheld, powered by Intel's Lunar Lake and comes with an 8" screen, Thunderbolt 4 port, and a larger 80 Wh battery (Sean Hollister/The Verge)
Intel says a standard AI kit featuring its Gaudi 2 chips, introduced in 2022, will cost $65K while a Gaudi 3 kit, unveiled in April 2024, will cost $125K (Reuters)
Intel announces Xeon 6 data center chips for AI: series 6700 with 144 efficient and 86 performance cores, and 6900 with 288 efficient and 128 performance cores (Ken Yeung/VentureBeat)
Intel unveils its Lunar Lake laptop chips, with a new SoC design, up to 14% faster CPU, 50% faster integrated GPU, and NPU with up to 48 TOPS of AI performance (Sean Hollister/The Verge)
